issues.title: [Feature Request] WorkflowClient and WorkflowHandle execute params are inconsistent
issues.author: bergundy
issues.summary: WorkflowClient.execute() and WorkflowHandle.execute() have inconsistent parameter ordering - client takes options first while handle takes workflow type first. The request is to standardize the signatures for better API consistency.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Return Promise from Worker.shutdown()
issues.author: lorensr
issues.summary: Feature request to make Worker.shutdown() return a Promise<void> instead of void, allowing cleaner async handling in test teardown code. After discussion, maintainers decided against this as shutdown is synchronous and returning the run promise would be confusing.

issues.title: [Bug] It's too easy to get confused by importing an activity directly
issues.author: Sushisource
issues.summary: Users can easily become confused by importing activity implementations directly instead of using registered activities, leading to unexpected behavior and potential webpack errors. The issue discusses whether to enforce stricter validation at registration time or improve documentation to guide proper activity usage.

issues.title: [Bug] Unknown failure during querying complete workflow.
issues.author: siliconprime-hoanguyen
issues.summary: Querying a complete workflow twice fails on the second query with an internal error about a nonexistent run ID. The first query succeeds but subsequent queries to the same completed workflow throw errors.

issues.title: SDK version might not be properly set
issues.author: bergundy
issues.summary: SDK version was being read redundantly from package.json instead of using the already-loaded pkg module. The issue was that package.json was being accessed multiple times when the pkg module should have been reused for efficiency.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Plan for supporting npm modules that require ESM, eg node-fetch
issues.author: swyxio
issues.summary: The SDK cannot currently use pure ESM npm modules like node-fetch@3 due to hardcoded CommonJS Webpack configuration. As the Node ecosystem increasingly adopts ESM, this limitation will become a growing problem requiring a bundling solution that supports both ESM and CommonJS.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Provide better error message when creating a child workflow which is not registered
issues.author: bergundy
issues.summary: Feature request to add validation in createChildWorkflowHandle to ensure the child workflow is registered and exported, with the workflow function name matching the export name. This helps catch configuration errors early with better error messages.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Signal total ordering
issues.author: lorensr
issues.summary: Feature request for signal total ordering - ensuring signals are processed in the exact order they're received globally across signal types in TypeScript workflows. The discussion explores various implementation approaches including object-based handlers, channel-based queuing, and serial processing utilities.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Assist with use-before-define bugs
issues.author: lorensr
issues.summary: Feature request to help catch use-before-define bugs when imperative APIs for signals and queries are defined after workflow start time. Proposes warning logs in development and/or buffering signals until handlers are registered.

issues.title: [Bug] activity heartbeat options are double documented
issues.author: swyxio
issues.summary: Activity heartbeat options are duplicated in the API documentation, appearing twice on the same documentation page. This suggests a potential documentation generation or configuration issue.

issues.title: [Feature Request] workflow.sleep args should pass through `ms`
issues.author: swyxio
issues.summary: Request to make workflow.sleep() accept arguments in milliseconds (ms) for consistent API with timeout parameters throughout the SDK.

issues.title: [Feature Request] replace workDir with utility func, and switch to `nodeModulesPaths` array for webpack
issues.author: swyxio
issues.summary: Feature request to replace the workDir parameter with a utility function and switch to using nodeModulesPaths array for webpack configuration in the TypeScript SDK Worker. The discussion explores better approaches for resolving workflow and module paths.

issues.title: [Feature Request] continueAsNew with a taskQueue
issues.author: alex-dixon
issues.summary: User requests ability to specify a different task queue when using continueAsNew to transition a workflow to a new execution. The feature is already supported by ContinueAsNewOptions but is not properly exposed in the public API documentation.

issues.title: [Bug] publish-to-verdaccio fails
issues.author: lorensr
issues.summary: The publish-to-verdaccio script fails with ECONNREFUSED when the local registry storage directory exists from a previous run, and also modifies package.json files on the first attempt, causing uncommitted changes on retry.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Dynamic Workflow signal and query handler registration
issues.author: bergundy
issues.summary: Feature request to add dynamic signal and query handler registration in TypeScript SDK workflows, enabling DSL creation and high-level abstractions like awaitable Signal objects during workflow execution.

issues.title: Post-release: Update server version-feature mapping
issues.author: Sushisource
issues.summary: Update the server version-feature mapping to include Node.js SDK support for execution chain following. Also verify that SDK version info is being properly sent to the server.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Support single-file workflowsPath
issues.author: lorensr
issues.summary: Support for single-file workflows path in Worker configuration. Currently workflowsPath only accepts directories, but users need the ability to specify a single workflow file (e.g., ./workflows.js) instead of requiring a directory structure.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Support history replay as exported from tctl and Temporal web
issues.author: bergundy
issues.summary: Feature request to add workflow history replay capability to the TypeScript SDK. This is a critical feature for debugging workflows by replaying exported history from tctl and Temporal web, similar to other SDKs.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Better crash message than [TransportError: transport error] when docker-compose not running
issues.author: swyxio
issues.summary: When a new TypeScript SDK project is run without a local Temporal instance, users receive a cryptic [TransportError: transport error] message instead of helpful guidance. The request is for a more informative error message that explains what went wrong.

issues.title: [Bug] Failure to gather logs from core on Worker shutdown
issues.author: bergundy
issues.summary: A stack overflow error occurs when gathering forwarded logs from the core worker on shutdown, caused by conflicting `takeWhile` and `repeat` operators in the log collection logic.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Hide isolateExecutionTimeout Worker option
issues.author: bergundy
issues.summary: Request to hide the isolateExecutionTimeout worker option and default to the workflow task timeout instead, as there are already many exposed options and isolates are entered multiple times during a single workflow task execution.

issues.title: Add timestamps to logger interface
issues.author: bergundy
issues.summary: Request to add timestamps to the logger interface in the TypeScript SDK. This is a feature request to enhance logging capabilities by including timestamp information.

issues.title: Flaky integration test
issues.author: bergundy
issues.summary: Integration tests are experiencing flakiness related to shutdown ordering in the Core component. The issue was identified and fixed in Core's shutdown sequencing logic.

issues.title: [Bug] Auto generated changelogs and versions are not working as intended
issues.author: bergundy
issues.summary: Lerna was not properly versioning the meta package according to its dependencies, resulting in breaking changes not being reflected in version bumps. The changelog generation was also broken, with commits being misclassified and duplicated across packages. The issue was resolved by adopting a single version for all packages in the monorepo.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Asynchronous Activity Completion
issues.author: mikegai
issues.summary: Feature request to support asynchronous activity completion in TypeScript SDK, similar to Go SDK. Currently activities must return immediately even if work continues asynchronously, requiring workarounds with signals for long-running operations.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Change parameter order for injected functions?
issues.author: lorensr
issues.summary: User proposes changing the parameter order for injected workflow functions so that `workflowInfo` is passed as the last optional parameter instead of first, arguing this is more intuitive and aligns better with the method signature defined in the interface.

issues.title: [Bug] Worker crashes occasionally during load tests
issues.author: bergundy
issues.summary: Worker crashes intermittently during load tests with a V8 promise hook assertion failure. The crash occurs in native code during promise processing and is difficult to reproduce locally.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Add `defaults` for workflow handle creation on `WorkflowClient` constructor
issues.author: bergundy
issues.summary: Feature request to add default WorkflowOptions to WorkflowClient constructor, allowing users to specify task queue and other options once instead of repeatedly when creating workflow handles.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Protobuf payload converter support
issues.author: bergundy
issues.summary: Add support for protobuf payload converters (JSON and binary formats) to the TypeScript SDK to enable full cross-language interoperability. This requires implementing a payload converter and integrating it with the default data converter.

issues.title: [Bug] Load tests fail due to timeouts on buildkite
issues.author: bergundy
issues.summary: Load tests fail intermittently due to DEADLINE EXCEEDED errors on query requests in the TypeScript SDK. Investigation revealed the root cause was a server-side query timeout issue, which was fixed upstream. Test stability was also improved by tuning down cached workflow limits.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Match dev and CI linting
issues.author: lorensr
issues.summary: Developer wants linting errors caught locally during development and commits, not just in CI. Currently commitlint runs only in GitHub workflows, missing issues that could be caught before pushing.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Document external calling convention for activities
issues.author: Sushisource
issues.summary: Activity registration changes broke external calling conventions. Documentation needed for how activities are called by type-string, and error messages should list available activities when a matching activity type isn't found.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Improve Context API docs
issues.author: lorensr
issues.summary: Documentation request to improve discoverability of the Context API by showing it as 'Context' instead of 'ContextImpl' in generated docs, and to list default activity options in a more accessible location.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Flexible workflow and main method naming
issues.author: joebowbeer
issues.summary: Feature request to support flexible workflow and method naming across language SDKs to enable seamless migration. Currently, the TypeScript SDK requires workflows to be named from filenames and use an `execute` method, creating incompatibilities with PHP and Java implementations that use custom method names.

issues.title: [Bug] Worker.create fails with activities undefined
issues.author: joebowbeer
issues.summary: Worker.create fails when activities is set to undefined, throwing MODULE_NOT_FOUND error instead of handling the undefined value gracefully. The SDK should either accept undefined activities or provide a clear error message.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Test support
issues.author: joebowbeer
issues.summary: Feature request for official testing support in Node.js SDK, specifically for workflows and activities. Users need a TestWorkflowEnvironment similar to Java and Go SDKs, and better example projects with jest/eslint configuration.

issues.title: [Bug] Perform execution-chain following behavior in later server versions
issues.author: Sushisource
issues.summary: TypeScript SDK needs to implement execution-chain following behavior that was fixed in the Go SDK (PR #527). This ensures proper handling of workflow execution chains in later server versions.

issues.title: [Bug] Can't resolve built-in node libraries
issues.author: alex-dixon
issues.summary: Webpack compilation fails when importing built-in Node.js libraries like `fs` and `os` in the TypeScript SDK. The issue stems from webpack defaulting to 'web' target instead of 'node', causing it to require polyfills for core Node modules.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Opentracing Support
issues.author: jmoseley
issues.summary: Request for OpenTracing support in the TypeScript SDK to enable distributed tracing across Node.js clients and Go workers. User needs traces to flow from workflow triggers through activities using existing OpenTracing infrastructure with Datadog backend.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Provide a method for getting a client instance on `activity.Context`
issues.author: Sushisource
issues.summary: Feature request to provide a method for accessing the worker's client instance from within activity code. Currently there's no easy way to get the same configured client from activities, which caused issues with activities using incorrect server URLs.

issues.title: [Bug] GH actions sometimes fails due to DEADLINE EXCEEDED
issues.author: bergundy
issues.summary: GitHub Actions tests occasionally fail with DEADLINE EXCEEDED errors due to reuse of the same client connection for concurrent tests. The issue only occurs on the weak GitHub Actions executors, not in local development environments.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Enable in-browser usage of gRPC client
issues.author: Sushisource
issues.summary: Enable the TypeScript SDK gRPC client to work in web browsers by leveraging gRPC-Web, with a client package free of non-proto core dependencies. This requires both client-side support and server-side infrastructure (proxy or HTTP/1.1 API).

issues.title: [Bug] Set the correct worker binary ID
issues.author: bergundy
issues.summary: The worker binary ID should be determined by the workflow bundle checksum rather than just the SDK version, to ensure consistent identification across deployments with the same code.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Remove broken Worker suspend and resume polling methods
issues.author: bergundy
issues.summary: Remove the broken Worker suspend and resume polling methods from the TypeScript SDK. Core has moved WFT polling to background execution, making the current suspend/resume implementation incompatible. These methods should be disabled for now until properly reimplemented.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Go over WF activation logic
issues.author: bergundy
issues.summary: Review and optimize workflow activation logic in the TypeScript SDK, including handling of signals execution order, activation errors, and microtask synchronization requirements.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Make deadline for workflow client and stub calls configurable
issues.author: bergundy
issues.summary: Feature request to make the deadline for workflow client and stub calls configurable. The issue was marked as completed, indicating the feature has been implemented.

issues.title: [Bug] Cannot find module 'ms'
issues.author: alex-dixon
issues.summary: Module resolution error where the 'ms' package cannot be found when using @temporal/client in AWS Lambda environment. The error originates from @temporalio/workflow/lib/time.js but 'ms' is listed as a dependency in package.json.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Clarify namespace version menu items
issues.author: lorensr
issues.summary: API reference documentation shows repeated 'v1' namespace labels in the menu, appearing as a bug. User requests clarification by either showing both namespace and version (e.g., 'command.v1', 'common.v1') or omitting generated protobuf types from the reference.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Sort docs menu items
issues.author: lorensr
issues.summary: Documentation menu items are not in alphabetical order, forcing users to use search (Cmd-F) instead of scrolling. The author suggests sorting menu items to improve discoverability.

issues.title: Clarify Mac contributing set up instructions
issues.author: lorensr
issues.summary: Mac developer encountered missing Rust/Cargo installation when following the Environment setup instructions. After discovering and following the building.md documentation and running lerna clean, the build succeeded. Clarification needed on whether all macOS developers need to follow building.md or just some.

issues.title: [strawman] React-like API proposal
issues.author: swyxio
issues.summary: Proposal for a React-like API design for the TypeScript SDK that leverages the popularity and proven patterns of React to improve Temporal adoption and API design, while adapting for Temporal-specific concepts like Sagas, hook registration, and external invocations.

issues.title: Use incremental sequence number for correlation IDs between core and lang
issues.author: bergundy
issues.summary: Implement incremental sequence numbers for correlation IDs between the TypeScript SDK and core runtime to improve tracing and debugging capabilities.

issues.title: Remove `CancelledError` from WF lib, use `CancelledFailure` for cancelling a cancellation scope
issues.author: bergundy
issues.summary: Remove the `CancelledError` class from the workflow library and replace it with `CancelledFailure` to maintain consistency with the Java SDK after porting the failure classes.

issues.title: [Bug] Cannot find temporal modules during build
issues.author: lorensr
issues.summary: Build fails with TypeScript module resolution errors for @temporalio packages when running `npm run build` in the SDK monorepo. The issue was resolved by running `npx lerna clean -- -f && npm ci && npm run build` to properly clean and reinstall dependencies.

issues.title: [Bug] Worker fails to start with no workflows
issues.author: bergundy
issues.summary: Worker fails to start when no workflows directory is configured, throwing an error about missing WorkerOptions. If the workflows directory exists but is empty, webpack fails with a file not found error.

issues.title: [Bug] proto package depends on core-bridge
issues.author: bergundy
issues.summary: @temporalio/proto package had an unnecessary dependency on @temporalio/core-bridge, which was added only to work around a Lerna versioning issue. This caused clients to indirectly depend on core-bridge despite the Rust compilation overhead being irrelevant to proto consumers.

issues.title: Automate release process
issues.author: bergundy
issues.summary: Automate the SDK release process, including automated releases to the 'next' tag on merge to 'main' branch. Implementation was tracked in a separate issue.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Discuss project structure
issues.author: bergundy
issues.summary: Simplify TypeScript project structure by consolidating multiple tsconfig files into a single configuration now that workflow code is bundled with Webpack, trading some type safety for better developer experience and reduced complexity.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Discuss activity registration and imports
issues.author: bergundy
issues.summary: Feature request to improve activity registration and import patterns in TypeScript SDK. Currently uses scoped imports (@activities/something) for implicit type safety, but community members suggest alternative approaches: Context.activities<ActivityInterface>() for flexible registration or enforcing a single entry point (@activities/index.ts) to prevent duplicates.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Implement stack trace query
issues.author: bergundy
issues.summary: Request to implement a stack trace query feature for the TypeScript SDK that can retrieve all stack traces from a Workflow isolate.

issues.title: [Bug] perf jaeger export is broken
issues.author: bergundy
issues.summary: Jaeger export functionality is broken in the TypeScript SDK performance tests, with spans not appearing in Jaeger. The issue suggests either fixing the exporter or switching to the OpenTelemetry collector exporter.

issues.title: [Bug] Worker significantly slows down over time
issues.author: bergundy
issues.summary: Worker performance degrades significantly over time during high-concurrency workload execution, with throughput dropping from ~100 WFs/s to ~10 WFs/s. Investigation identified that the SDK was leaking isolate references, causing memory pressure and CPU overhead.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Implement WorkflowStub.signalWithStart
issues.author: bergundy
issues.summary: Request to implement WorkflowStub.signalWithStart method in the TypeScript SDK client package, which is currently missing.

issues.title: [Bug] CI fails when installing from verdaccio without any logs
issues.author: bergundy
issues.summary: CI installation from verdaccio private registry fails silently with no error logs, making it difficult to diagnose the root cause. Logging was added to provide better diagnostic information.

issues.title: [Bug] Query handler should not be async
issues.author: bergundy
issues.summary: Query handlers should not be async because they can create commands and mutate state, breaking workflow determinism. The SDK should enforce this by throwing a DeterminismViolationError when a query handler returns a Promise.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Port Workflow error classes from Java SDK
issues.author: bergundy
issues.summary: Request to port error classes from Java SDK to TypeScript SDK, including activity failure errors with isRetryable attribute for better error handling and retry logic.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Implement search attributes
issues.author: bergundy
issues.summary: Feature request to implement search attributes in the TypeScript SDK once they are supported in sdk-core. This was later resolved by PR #657.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Implement child workflows
issues.author: bergundy
issues.summary: Feature request to implement child workflows in the TypeScript SDK once they are supported by sdk-core.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Implement ContinueAsNew
issues.author: bergundy
issues.summary: Feature request to implement ContinueAsNew functionality in the TypeScript SDK, pending support in sdk-core.

issues.title: [Bug] Increase Workflow isolate timeout to handle slow Github Actions worker nodes
issues.author: bergundy
issues.summary: CI workflow isolation timeout was too short, causing failures on slow GitHub Actions worker nodes. The fix involved increasing the isolate timeout to provide more time for the test environment to initialize.

issues.title: [Bug] EvalError: Code generation from strings disallowed for this context
issues.author: zomble
issues.summary: Webpack's default eval-based devtool causes EvalError when running workflows in isolated-vm context. The issue occurs when isolate memory is below a certain threshold (~65GB), triggering code generation restrictions in isolated-vm.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Organize samples in repo
issues.author: bergundy
issues.summary: Request to reorganize samples in the SDK repository for better browsability and maintainability. Discussion centered on managing shared configuration files and reducing duplication while keeping samples easy for developers to copy and use independently.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Custom data converters
issues.author: bergundy
issues.summary: Request to support custom data converters in Workflow isolates. Currently, custom data converters work in worker and client contexts but cannot be passed to Workflows that run in isolation without access to node libraries. The interface should be made asynchronous to support network requests and non-blocking compression.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Add missing `ActivityCancellationType` to `ActivityOptions`
issues.author: bergundy
issues.summary: Add the missing `ActivityCancellationType` enum to `ActivityOptions` in the TypeScript SDK to provide programmatic control over how activities handle cancellation requests.

issues.title: [Bug] No message returned when running hello world sample app
issues.author: denjalonso
issues.summary: Hello World sample workflow doesn't return output message when executed. User follows the Node.js getting started guide but receives no "Hello, Temporal!" message output when running the scheduled workflow script, though the workflow appears to run in Temporal Web.

issues.title: [Bug] Getting a "TypeError: otel.setSpan is not a function" error when running hello world sample app
issues.author: denjalonso
issues.summary: Worker initialization fails with 'TypeError: otel.setSpan is not a function' when running the hello world sample application. The error occurs in the tracing module during worker startup and is caused by an OpenTelemetry dependency version incompatibility.

issues.title: Run clippy as part of CI
issues.author: bergundy
issues.summary: Add Clippy linting to the TypeScript SDK CI pipeline. Clippy should be run as part of the continuous integration process to catch code quality issues, similar to how it's implemented in the Core repository.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Review timeout / retries and reconnection configuration for the client connection
issues.author: bergundy
issues.summary: Feature request to review and expose timeout, retries, and reconnection configuration for the TypeScript SDK client connection, similar to the Java SDK's gRPC-level and SDK-level retry mechanisms.

issues.title: [Bug] 14 UNAVAILABLE error against Cloud deployment
issues.author: jmoseley
issues.summary: gRPC connection to Temporal Cloud drops during RPC calls with '14 UNAVAILABLE: Connection dropped' error. The error persists even after reconnection attempts and keep-alive configuration. Resolved by switching from grpc.Credentials to TLSConfig for TLS certificate management.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Auto compile project on worker run
issues.author: rylandg
issues.summary: Request to automatically compile TypeScript code when running a worker, eliminating the need for users to maintain a separate watch process. This would streamline local development by combining compilation and worker execution into a single command.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Searchable SDK docs
issues.author: swyxio
issues.summary: Users have difficulty finding information in the TypeScript SDK documentation. A search feature is needed to improve discoverability, potentially using Algolia or alternative solutions.

issues.title: [Bug] Getting a "ValueError: Unknown Encoding: ^P�)^F0�" error when running hello world sample app
issues.author: vkarpov15
issues.summary: Worker crashes with "ValueError: Unknown Encoding" error when processing payloads from old task queue entries. The issue occurs when stale workflows from previous runs use incompatible encoding, causing the data converter to fail.

issues.title: [Bug] Activity identifier should not include the activity module name
issues.author: bergundy
issues.summary: Activity identifiers in the TypeScript SDK include the module name using JSON.stringify([module, functionName]), but this is inconsistent with other SDKs. The fix should use only the function name as the identifier and have the Worker throw an error on duplicate activity names.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Limit Workflow activation time
issues.author: bergundy
issues.summary: Feature request to implement a configurable timeout for workflow activation to prevent workers from becoming unresponsive when workflows enter infinite loops. This would limit CPU usage and thread pool occupation caused by stuck workflows.

issues.title: [Bug] `npm init @temporalio ...` might fail if out-of-date
issues.author: bergundy
issues.summary: The `npm init @temporalio` command may fail when users run it a second time after a new version of `@temporalio/create` is released, because npm doesn't update the cached package which may contain an incompatible project template.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Add ability to debug Workflow code in isolates
issues.author: bergundy
issues.summary: Add debugger support for Workflow code running in v8 isolates. Currently debugging workflows is not possible, which is a critical usability gap that needs comprehensive implementation and documentation.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Use source maps for better stack traces in WF isolate code
issues.author: bergundy
issues.summary: Workflow stack traces show compiled JavaScript line numbers instead of TypeScript source line numbers, making debugging difficult. The solution is to generate and use source maps similar to ts-node, which may require building the Workflow Isolate from TypeScript sources instead of compiled JS.

issues.title: Create a shared dependency for the worker and client packages
issues.author: bergundy
issues.summary: Proposal to create a shared dependency package that both the worker and client packages can depend on, reducing duplication and improving maintainability across the TypeScript SDK.

issues.title: Clean up Js->Rust value conversion code in native bridge
issues.author: bergundy
issues.summary: Refactor the native Rust bridge value extraction code by replacing a repetitive 3-line pattern with a reusable macro to improve code cleanliness and maintainability.

issues.title: [Bug] Intermediate certificates sample does not work on MacOS
issues.author: bergundy
issues.summary: Worker fails to connect using intermediate certificates on macOS with 'UnknownIssuer' error when following the mTLS tutorial with the tls-full sample. The issue appears to be related to how gRPC-Node handles certificate chains on macOS.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Automated load testing
issues.author: bergundy
issues.summary: Implement automated load testing that runs on every PR to stress-test the system and uncover bugs that integration tests miss. Testing should include cloud deployment scenarios to validate address and TLS options.

issues.title: [Bug] Remove snipsync comments from generated code when creating a new package
issues.author: bergundy
issues.summary: Snipsync comments (// @@@SNIP{START,END}) are incorrectly appearing in generated code when creating a new package via npm init @temporalio. These comments should be stripped away during code generation.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Provide way to specify SSL configuration for Worker->Service connection
issues.author: bergundy
issues.summary: Worker needs SSL/TLS configuration support for secure connections to Temporal service in production environments. Currently only the Client supports SSL configuration, creating a gap for production Worker deployments.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Run a stress test
issues.author: bergundy
issues.summary: Request to implement stress testing capability for the TypeScript SDK to verify correctness under load, ensure no crashes or memory leaks, and publish results for transparency about alpha release performance expectations.

issues.title: [Bug] Path aliases easily confused with package scopes
issues.author: joebowbeer
issues.summary: Path aliases using `@` prefix in auto-generated packages cause confusion with npm package scopes like `@temporalio`, and path aliases break after `npm pack`. The issue was resolved by keeping only the necessary `@activities` alias for the webpack resolver.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Support workflow versioning
issues.author: bergundy
issues.summary: Add workflow versioning support to the TypeScript SDK to enable code changes for running workflows, similar to Java SDK implementation using history markers or webpack bundling.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Publish API docs
issues.author: bergundy
issues.summary: Add API documentation generation to the TypeScript SDK release flow. Publish generated docs to a docs branch organized by package version.

issues.title: Use snipsync for all code snippets in docs
issues.author: bergundy
issues.summary: Implement snipsync integration to automatically test code snippets in TypeScript SDK documentation, preventing them from breaking due to code changes.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Warn about API instability
issues.author: bergundy
issues.summary: Add a warning to the TypeScript SDK API documentation and code about API instability during early development. The project's APIs are not yet stable and need more user feedback before reaching production-ready status.

issues.title: [Bug] Worker times out when trying to shutdown gracefully
issues.author: bergundy
issues.summary: Worker times out when attempting graceful shutdown via Ctrl-C. This issue affects the shutdown process of the TypeScript SDK worker, making it difficult to cleanly stop workers.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Use `@grpc/grpc-js` instead of the deprecated `grpc` package
issues.author: bergundy
issues.summary: Request to migrate from the deprecated `grpc` package to `@grpc/grpc-js` for faster installations on Node 15+. Discussion reveals potential TLS/mTLS compatibility issues that were encountered in other Temporal projects.

issues.title: Figure out how to propagate logs out of the workflow
issues.author: bergundy
issues.summary: Design a proper logging system for workflows that integrates with the worker logger instead of injecting console.log. Workflow internals need dedicated logging capabilities separate from user workflow code.

issues.title: Handle errors returned from core correctly
issues.author: bergundy
issues.summary: Define a clear strategy for handling different types of errors returned from core methods in the TypeScript SDK. This involves standardizing error handling across various core operations to ensure consistent and predictable error behavior.

issues.title: Implement workflow cleanup
issues.author: bergundy
issues.summary: No method currently exists to cleanup a completed workflow. The issue discusses the need to define how workflow cleanup should be handled in terms of core and language-specific responsibilities.

issues.title: Complete API documentation for all public packages
issues.author: bergundy
issues.summary: Complete API documentation for all public packages in the TypeScript SDK. This task involves documenting the worker, client, workflow, activity, proto, and create packages, with documentation to be published.

issues.title: Implement worker limits
issues.author: bergundy
issues.summary: Implement missing worker concurrency and rate limiting options from WorkerOptions. Partial implementation exists for maxConcurrentActivityExecutions and maxConcurrentWorkflowTaskExecutions, with other limits pending Core SDK support.

issues.title: Get integration tests passing for activities
issues.author: bergundy
issues.summary: Ensure all test activity cases are covered in integration tests, including all ActivityResult variants and heartbeat timeout scenarios on the workflow side.

issues.title: Include a roadmap in readme
issues.author: pikaciu22x
issues.summary: User requests adding a roadmap to the TypeScript SDK README to clarify the project's current state and supported features. They want to contribute but the early-stage status and lack of clarity create uncertainty about what can be used.

issues.title: Add connection options to worker constructor
issues.author: bergundy
issues.summary: Worker constructor lacks connection options, forcing localhost-only connections. This issue requests adding connection options to the worker constructor and passing them to core initialization.

issues.title: Set up logger for worker package
issues.author: bergundy
issues.summary: Request to set up a logger for the worker package with support for popular Node.js loggers or custom logger injection, with fallback to console.error.

issues.title: Add utility to turn exceptions into `temporal.api.failure.v1.IFailureIFailure`
issues.author: bergundy
issues.summary: Add a utility function to convert exceptions into the standardized temporal.api.failure.v1.IFailure format for use throughout the TypeScript SDK codebase.

issues.title: Don't buffer poll results in core-lang bridge (lib.rs)
issues.author: bergundy
issues.summary: The current implementation buffers poll results in a queue when polling in a separate thread, which can cause timing issues. Activities may be marked as started before the worker actually processes them, creating race conditions between polling and execution.

issues.title: Detect and throw on cyclic module dependencies
issues.author: bergundy
issues.summary: The TypeScript SDK loader hangs when cyclic module dependencies are detected. The issue requests detection and proper error throwing instead of hanging.

issues.title: Fix worker crash when workflow file not found
issues.author: bergundy
issues.summary: Worker crashes with LoaderError when a referenced workflow file is not found. The node-side error handling needs improvement and core may not be handling the failure correctly.

issues.title: Set up publish from CI
issues.author: bergundy
issues.summary: Set up CI/CD pipeline to automatically publish TypeScript SDK packages to npm. Needs decisions on publish trigger, version bumping strategy, and changelog generation.

issues.title: Run E2E test for `npm init @temporalio`
issues.author: bergundy
issues.summary: Add E2E testing for `npm init @temporalio` workflow to verify the project initialization functionality doesn't break with each PR. The test should verify the complete workflow from publishing packages to a temporary registry, initializing a project, building it, and running worker/tests.

issues.title: Review the various README.md files in the project
issues.author: bergundy
issues.summary: Review and improve README.md files across the project to provide better explanations of what each package contains.

issues.title: Drain any remaining activations from `poll_task` until it returns `CoreError::ShuttingDown`
issues.author: bergundy
issues.summary: The worker's poll_task needs to drain remaining activations and properly detect the ShuttingDown signal during graceful shutdown. Currently, the promise from worker.run() never resolves because poll_task is blocked on a long poll and cannot see the shutdown flag.

issues.title: error running through README
issues.author: swyxio
issues.summary: README instructions fail because @temporalio/create package hasn't been published to npm yet. User encounters 404 error when trying to initialize a new project and requests documentation on how the package aliases are configured.

issues.title: Distribute pre-built binaries for native code
issues.author: bergundy
issues.summary: Request to distribute pre-built binaries for native Rust code used in the TypeScript SDK worker and workflow-isolate-extension to simplify installation and avoid requiring node-gyp compilation.

issues.title: Run integration tests in CI
issues.author: bergundy
issues.summary: Integration tests are currently disabled via environment variable in CI. This issue requests enabling them by running a server with Docker Compose as part of the continuous integration pipeline.

issues.title: Fix CI on windows
issues.author: bergundy
issues.summary: CI build on Windows fails during compilation of the workflow-isolate-extension due to errors in the isolated-vm library dependency.

issues.title: Revisit cancellation and scopes design
issues.author: bergundy
issues.summary: Design review needed for cancellation and scopes implementation in the TypeScript SDK. The previous design in PR#5 was not agreed upon and should be revisited after project restructuring.

issues.title: Scheduler code style nit
issues.author: swyxio
issues.summary: Code style suggestions for the scheduler implementation: simplify complex conditional logic by breaking it into separate variables, and clarify the use of while(true) loop for handling event exhaustion.
